ToolCards.name: Roughing Forceps
ToolCards.description: After drafting, increase or decrease the value of the drafted die by 1. 1 may not change to 6, or 6 to 1.

ToolCards.name: Eglomise Brush
ToolCards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the color restrictions. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

ToolCards.name: Copper Foil Reamer
ToolCards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring shade restrictions. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

ToolCards.name: Lathekin
ToolCards.description: Move exactly two dice, obeying all placement restrictions.

ToolCards.name: Circular Cutter
ToolCards.description: After drafting, swap the drafted die with a die from the Round Track.

ToolCards.name: Firm Pastry Brush
ToolCards.description: After drafting, re-roll che drafted die. If it cannot be placed, return it to the Draft Pool.

ToolCards.name: Gavel
ToolCards.description: Re-roll all dice in the Draft Pool. This may only be used on your second turn before drafting.

ToolCards.name: Wheels Pincher
ToolCards.description: After your first turn, immediately draft a die. Skip your next turn this round.

ToolCards.name: Cork Line
ToolCards.description: After drafting, place the die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

ToolCards.name: Diamond Swab
ToolCards.description: After drafting, flip the die to its opposite side. 6 flips to 1, 5 to 2, 4 to 3, etc.

ToolCards.name: Firm Pastry Thinner
ToolCards.description: After drafting, return the die to the Dice Bag and pull 1 die from the bag. Choose a value and place the nwe die, obeying all placement restrictions, or return it to the Draft Pool.

ToolCards.name: Manual Cutter
ToolCards.description: Move up to two dice of the same color that match the color of a die on the Round Track. You must obey all placement restrictions.
